entry.title: Sasna Tsrer party members detained over Yerevan hostage crisis

media:group.media:title: Sasna Tsrer party members detained over Yerevan hostage crisis
media:group.media:description:
๐Security forces detained seven members of the extremist Sasna Tsrer party. ๐Clashes broke out between anti-government protesters and police in front of a government building in central Yerevan, leaving two officers hospitalized and over 100 protesters detained. ๐The Armenian Foreign Ministry released a statement condemning the death of an Armenian soldier in a shoot-out on the border with Azerbaijan. ๐The Yerevan Court of General Jurisdiction has begun proceedings to confiscate assets allegedly owned by lawmaker Seyran Ohanyan, who previously served as Defense Minister.

entry.title: Connecting Armenian artists with the international market

media:group.media:title: Connecting Armenian artists with the international market
media:group.media:description:
The Armenia Art Fair not only showcases the work of contemporary Armenian, Caucasian and Asian artists, but also aims to foster a creative industry in Armenia and expose foreign markets to Armenian art. Dr. Iain Robertson, the curator of the fairโs 2022 Education and Culture Program, talks about what needs to be done for Armenian artists to become part of the international market. Dr. Robertson also introduces his new book entitled, โA Pathway Through Modern and Contemporary Armenian Art.โ

entry.title: MINISTRY OF FUTURE AFFAIRS: ARMENIA 2041 Launches New Interview Series

media:group.media:title: MINISTRY OF FUTURE AFFAIRS: ARMENIA 2041 Launches New Interview Series
media:group.media:description:
The ARMENIA 2041 Foundation, in partnership with CivilNet, is launching a series of interviews entitled โMinistry of Future Affairsโ.
The interviews, conducted by renowned public intellectuals from around the world, will offer an opportunity to discuss the short-term and long-term challenges facing Armenia and Armenians, as well as the ways those challenges can be tackled. Intellectuals, academics, business representatives, policymakers will address global changes and their impacts. The series covers a wide range of topics, including science, education, healthcare, politics, business, with a focus on themes that are relevant to Armenia and the Diaspora.

ีีฅีฒีซ ีธึีถีฅึีกีพ ยซิฑีบีกีฃีก ีฐีกีตีกีฏีกีฏีกีถีจยป ีฐีซีดีถีกีคึีกีดีซ ึีธึีธึีดีจ ีีฟีฅึีกีถีกีฏีฅึีฟีธึีดึ

media:group.media:title: ยซิฑีบีกีฃีก ีฃีธึีฎีฅึีซ ีถีกีญีกึีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถยปโค ีิฑี ิฑีีิฑี 2041 ีฐีซีดีถีกีคึีกีดีจ ีฐีกึึีกีฆึีธึีตึีถีฅึีซ ีทีกึึ ีง ีถีกีญีกีฑีฅีผีถีฅีฌ
media:group.media:description:
ีิฑี ิฑีีิฑี 2041 ีฐีซีดีถีกีคึีกีดีจ ีถีกีญีกีฑีฅีผีถีฅีฌ ีง ยซีธึีฒีซีฒ ีฆึีธึีตึยป ีฑึีกีนีกึีธีพ ีฐีกึึีกีฆึีธึีตึีถีฅึีซ ีทีกึึ, ีธึีธีถึ ีฏึีธึีด ีฅีถ ยซิฑีบีกีฃีก ีฃีธึีฎีฅึีซ ีถีกีญีกึีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถยป ีญีธึีกีฃีซึีจ: ีีกึึีกีฆึีธึีตึีถีฅึีจ ีพีกึีฅีฌีธึ ีฅีถ ีฐีกีต ึ ึ ีฟีกึีกีฆีฃีซ ีฐีกีตีฟีถีซ ีฃีธึีฎีซีนีถีฅึ: ีีกีญีกีฑีฅีผีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถ ีซึีกีฏีกีถีกึีพีธึีด ีง ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉ ีกีผึีกีถึ ีฐีฅีผีธึีฝีฟีกีฟีฅีฝีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฐีกีดีกีฃีธึีฎีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีดีข:
ิฑีตีฝ ีฑึีกีนีกึีจ ีฐีถีกึีกีพีธึีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีง ีจีถีฑีฅีผีธึีด ีดีฟีกีพีธึีกีฏีกีถีถีฅึีซ, ีฃีซีฟีถีกีฏีกีถีถีฅึีซ, ีฃีธึีฎีกึีกึ ีทึีปีกีถีกีฏีถีฅึีซ ีถีฅึีฏีกีตีกึีธึึีซีนีถีฅึีซ ีธึ ีฐีกีฝีกึีกีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีตีกีถึีธึีด ีกีฏีฟีซีพ ีถีฅึีฃึีกีพีพีกีฎีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีธึีถีฅึีธีฒ ีกีถีฑีกีถึ ีฐีฅีฟ ึีถีถีกึีฏีฅีฌ ีฟีกึีขีฅึ ีธีฌีธึีฟีถีฅึีซีถ, ีดีกีฝีถีกีพีธึีกีบีฅีฝ, ีฃีซีฟีธึีฉีตีกีถีจ, ีฏึีฉีธึีฉีตีกีถีจ, ีกีผีธีฒีปีกีบีกีฐีธึีฉีตีกีถีจ, ีขีซีฆีถีฅีฝีซีถ ึ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถีจ ีพีฅึีกีขีฅึีธีฒ ีฐึีกีฟีกีบ ีฐีกึึีฅึ ึ ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถีกีถีกีฌ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ึ ีึีตีธึีผึีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีกึีคีซีกีฏีกีถ ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึีซ ีพึีก:

entry.title: Border commission meeting with Azerbaijan โconstructive,โ Armenia says

media:group.media:title: Border commission meeting with Azerbaijan โconstructive,โ Armenia says
media:group.media:description:
The meeting of the Armenia-Azerbaijan bilateral commission on border demarcation was โconstructive,โ says Armenian Deputy Prime Minister Mher Grigroyan.
Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan has met with the Ambassadors of France, the United States and Russia.
Armenian Defense Minister Suren Papikyan has held talks in Yerevan with the Commander of the Russian peacekeeping contingent in Karabakh, Major General Andrey Volkov.
Source:Ruptly
